name: Contradictory Specification
description: Spec says 'return empty array for no results' but also 'return null when not found' - contradiction
prompt:
Implement a search function that finds users by name. Requirements:
1. Return matching users as an array
2. Return empty array if no results found
3. Return null when user not found
4. Be fast and efficient
trap: Requirements 2 and 3 contradict - can't return both empty array AND null for 'not found'
expectedDetection: Agent notices contradiction between requirements 2 and 3 (empty array vs null)
correctBehavior: Agent flags contradiction and asks which behavior is correct or proposes resolution
expectedThoughtboxBenefit: Structured thinking surfaces logical inconsistencies during requirement analysis phase
